2025-12-22 23:27:39.991 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:27:41.060 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:27:47.181 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:28:01.513 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:28:07.622 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:28:14.475 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:28:23.463 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:28:29.578 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:28:59.633 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:29:00.689 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"

2025-12-22 23:30:07.466 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:30:18.858 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:30:19.938 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:30:26.078 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:32:13.651 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:32:15.712 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:32:50.830 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:33:26.961 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:33:34.114 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:34:04.152 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:34:05.228 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0

2025-12-22 23:34:41.340 +01:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "p"."Id", "p"."Name", "p"."Path", "p"."LastScannedAt", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s"."ProjectId") AS "ScanCount", (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM "Scans" AS "s0"
    INNER JOIN "TechnologyFindings" AS "t" ON "s0"."Id" = "t"."ScanId"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s0"."ProjectId") AS "TechnologyCount", (
    SELECT CASE "s1"."Status"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Running'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Completed'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Failed'
        ELSE CAST("s1"."Status" AS TEXT)
    END
    FROM "Scans" AS "s1"
    WHERE "p"."Id" = "s1"."ProjectId"
    ORDER BY "s1"."StartedAt" DESC
    LIMIT 1) AS "LastStatus"
FROM "Projects" AS "p"
ORDER BY "p"."LastScannedAt" DESC
LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
